channel.title: Java Problem ! Serious and kinda complicated so plz no Noobs!
channel.description:
Ok lets start with that im not one of those dumb noobs and im busy for a longer time with creating a server... look the problem is i needed JDK to compile it , so i installed it (already changed PATH so maybe thats prob) after i compiled i tried to start the runserver.bat ... didnt work. And Mopar only worked when i started with the .bat file so i got a serious problem. It can be that the Microsoft java VM is still installed and i cant find it. Could someone solve the problem or say where MS virtual java VM is located.
PLz help me quick :)

item.title: Java Problem ! Serious and kinda complicated so plz no Noobs!
item.dc:creator: @darkflare81 darkflare81
item.description:
@darkflare81 wrote:

Well and i might be wrong but did u download the newest java jdk and jre which is update 10 and if u did u edit ur original classpath and all to say _10 i had the same problem but urs might not be it and there is a way if ur Microsoft VM is still installed just search for it duh

Read full topic

item.title: Java Problem ! Serious and kinda complicated so plz no Noobs!
item.dc:creator: @PKOwner PKOwner
item.description:
@PKOwner wrote:

Compiler error…
Not serious and complicated at all
Jdk 5.0 update 10 use this

@echo off COLOR 08 title name Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin/java.exe" server pause

Or this

@echo off title name "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

It depends the version you’re using

Read full topic

item.title: Java Problem ! Serious and kinda complicated so plz no Noobs!
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

@echo off COLOR 08 title ZamorakScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin/java.exe" server pause
That should be compile just cange the 6 to a 9…And here’s your runserver.

@echo off title zamorakScape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Other then that dont know what you can do maybe get a lower version of jdk like version 6 what i use and it alway’s work’s.

Read full topic
